ReferenceData.String:
SYNOPSIS
gmx [-f [<.xtc/.trr/...>]] [-f2 [<.xtc/.trr/...>]] [-lib [<.xtc/.trr/...>]] [-longfileopt [<.dat>]] [-longfileopt2 [<.dat>]]
OPTIONS
Options to specify input and output files:
-f [<.xtc/.trr/...>] (path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc) (Input) File name option with a long value: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb tng -f2 [<.xtc/.trr/...>] (path/to/long/trajectory.xtc) (Input) File name option with a long value: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb tng -lib [<.xtc/.trr/...>] (path/to/long/trajectory/name.xtc) (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with a long value and type: xtc trr cpt trj gro g96 pdb tng -longfileopt [<.dat>] (deffile.dat) (Input, Opt.) File name option with a long name -longfileopt2 [<.dat>] (path/to/long/file/name.dat) (Input, Opt., Lib.) File name option with multiple long fields
